nodes.text: Qor'thest, known as Qor'thest the Guardian, was a Force-sensitive male who was a member of the Dread Host, the armies of the Dread Masters during the Galactic War. During the Dread War on Oricon, Qor'thest was among the defenders of the Dread Fortress, but was slain in battle.
Qor'thest the Guardian appears as a bonus named enemy in the Operation "The Dread Fortress," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.4.
